doc.field: Contact Sheets: 7 sheets, all showing a Veterans Memorial Gathering. (Among the veterans pictured are: Steve Nelson, George Brodsky, Norman Berkowitz, Stanley Postek, George Watt, Abraham Osheroff, Albert Prago, Al Koslow, Moe Fishman, John Koblich, Abe Smorodin, Hy Wallach, Adolf (Buster) Ross, George A. Cullinen Jr., Stephen Zak, Pete Smith, Court Bevensee, John Tisa, Louis Gordon, John Tisa, John Robinson, John Toutoloff, James Yates, Oscar Hunter, Irving Weissman, Nat Gross, and Ken Graeber.)
